topic.title: Does ZeroNet seed all sites I visit?
topic.body: Does ZeroNet seed all sites I visit forever and ever?

topic.title: How is ZeroNet on bandwidth caps?
topic.body:
After about one day by ZeroNet usage is very high. 


Would zeronet be good or bad on people with limited internet

1_1LcaN7rwjqypHivGDHqnX4FXtrG6RKBe7w.body: When you start it then it will always be running while your PC is on. Otherwise you can kill it in your OS's task manager
